name: Troll Necklace Bounty
tooltip:
Troll Necklace Bounty

You've done it already, but we will continue to accept any troll tribal necklaces you find and are willing to turn in.  By turning them in to me, you'll continue to improve your standing amongst the Wildhammers; if you're willing to fight for us, then we'll be willing to fight for you!

I need five troll tribal necklaces for them to count, <name>.

Requirements:
- Troll Tribal Necklace x 5
